title: "Current SAIL Team"
subtitle: "Meet the talented individuals driving sports analytics innovation"

## Our Team

SAIL brings together a diverse group of undergraduate students, graduate advisors, and faculty members with expertise in statistics, computer science, data science, and sports analytics. Our collaborative approach combines academic rigor with practical application to deliver cutting-edge insights for UNC's athletic programs.

::: callout-note
## Team Structure

-   **Undergraduate Sports Analysts (USAs)**: Talented students applying analytics to real sports challenges
-   **Graduate Advisors**: Advanced researchers providing mentorship and technical expertise
-   **Faculty Advisors**: Experienced academics guiding research direction and methodology
:::
